   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(ei_format_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include("ei_format_SUITE_data/ei_format_test_cases.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([format_wo_ver/1,
   28:          all/0, suite/0,
   29:          init_per_testcase/2,
   30:          atoms/1,
   31:          tuples/1,
   32:          lists/1,
   33:          maps/1]).
   34: 
   35: -import(runner, [get_term/1]).
   36: 
   37: %% This test suite test the erl_format() function.
   38: %% It uses the port program "ei_format_test".
   39: 
   40: suite() ->
   41:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   42: 
   43: all() -> 
   44:     [format_wo_ver, atoms, tuples, lists, maps].
   45: 
   46: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   47:     runner:init_per_testcase(?MODULE, Case, Config).
   48: 
   49: %% Tests formatting various atoms.
   50: 
   51: atoms(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   52:     P = runner:start(Config, ?atoms),
   53: 
   54:     {term, ''} = get_term(P),
   55:     {term, 'a'} = get_term(P),
   56:     {term, 'A'} = get_term(P),
   57:     {term, 'abc'} = get_term(P),
   58:     {term, 'Abc'} = get_term(P),
   59:     {term, 'ab@c'} = get_term(P),
   60:     {term, 'The rain in Spain stays mainly in the plains'} =
   61:     get_term(P),
   62: 
   63:     {term, a} = get_term(P),
   64:     {term, ab} = get_term(P),
   65:     {term, abc} = get_term(P),
   66:     {term, ab@c} = get_term(P),
   67:     {term, abcdefghijklmnopq} = get_term(P),
   68: 
   69:     {term, ''} = get_term(P),
   70:     {term, 'a'} = get_term(P),
   71:     {term, 'A'} = get_term(P),
   72:     {term, 'abc'} = get_term(P),
   73:     {term, 'Abc'} = get_term(P),
   74:     {term, 'ab@c'} = get_term(P),
   75:     {term, 'The rain in Spain stays mainly in the plains'} =
   76:     get_term(P),
   77: 
   78:     {term, a} = get_term(P),
   79:     {term, ab} = get_term(P),
   80:     {term, abc} = get_term(P),
   81:     {term, ab@c} = get_term(P),
   82:     {term, '   abcdefghijklmnopq   '} = get_term(P),
   83: 
   84:     runner:recv_eot(P),
   85:     ok.
   86: 
   87: 
   88: 
   89: %% Tests formatting various tuples
   90: 
   91: tuples(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   92:     P = runner:start(Config, ?tuples),
   93: 
   94:     {term, {}} = get_term(P),
   95:     {term, {a}} = get_term(P),
   96:     {term, {a, b}} = get_term(P),
   97:     {term, {a, b, c}} = get_term(P),
   98:     {term, {1}} = get_term(P),
   99:     {term, {[]}} = get_term(P),
  100:     {term, {[], []}} = get_term(P),
  101:     {term, {[], a, b, c}} = get_term(P),
  102:     {term, {[], a, [], b, c}} = get_term(P),
  103:     {term, {[], a, '', b, c}} = get_term(P),
  104:     {term, {[], a, '', b, M}} = get_term(P),
  105:     #{c:=3} = M,
  106: 
  107:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  108:     ok.
  109: 
  110: 
  111: 
  112: %% Tests formatting various lists
  113: 
  114: lists(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  115:     P = runner:start(Config, ?lists),
  116: 
  117:     {term, []} = get_term(P),
  118:     {term, [a]} = get_term(P),
  119:     {term, [a, b]} = get_term(P),
  120:     {term, [a, b, c]} = get_term(P),
  121:     {term, [1]} = get_term(P),
  122:     {term, [[]]} = get_term(P),
  123:     {term, [[], []]} = get_term(P),
  124:     {term, [[], a, b, c]} = get_term(P),
  125:     {term, [[], a, [], b, c]} = get_term(P),
  126:     {term, [[], a, '', b, c]} = get_term(P),
  127:     {term, [[x, 2], [y, 3], [z, 4]]}= get_term(P),
  128:     {term, [{a,b},{c,d}]} = get_term(P),
  129:     {term, [{a,b},M]} = get_term(P),
  130:     #{c:=d} = M,
  131:     %% {term, [{name, 'Madonna'}, {age, 21}, {data, [{addr, "E-street", 42}]}]} = get_term(P),
  132: 
  133:     {term, [{pi, F1}, {'cos(70)', F2}]} = get_term(P),
  134:     %% don't match floats directly
  135:     true= abs(3.1415-F1) < 0.01,
  136:     true= abs(0.34202-F2) < 0.01,
  137: 
  138:     {term, [[pi, F3], ['cos(70)', F4]]} = get_term(P),
  139:     true= abs(3.1415-F3) < 0.01,
  140:     true= abs(0.34202-F4) < 0.01,
  141: 
  142: 
  143:     %%    {term, [[pi, 3.1415], [], ["cos(70)", 0.34202]]} = get_term(P),
  144:     {term, [-1]} = get_term(P),
  145:     {term, "hejsan"} = get_term(P),
  146: 
  147: 
  148:     Str1 = lists:duplicate(65535,$A),
  149:     Str2 = lists:duplicate(65536,$A),
  150:     {term,Str1} = get_term(P),
  151:     {term,Str2} = get_term(P),
  152: 
  153:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  154:     ok.
  155: 
  156: 
  157: %% Tests formatting various maps
  158: 
  159: maps(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  160:     P = runner:start(Config, ?maps),
  161: 
  162:     {term, M1} = get_term(P),
  163:     0 = maps:size(M1),
  164:     {term, M1} = get_term(P),
  165: 
  166:     {term, M2} = get_term(P),
  167:     true = (M2 =:= #{a => 1}),
  168:     {term, M2} = get_term(P),
  169: 
  170:     {term, M3} = get_term(P),
  171:     true = (M3 =:= #{a => 1, b => 2}),
  172:     {term, M3} = get_term(P),
  173: 
  174:     {term, M4} = get_term(P),
  175:     true = (M4 =:= #{[a] => 1, 2 => [b,c], "3" => {c,d}}),
  176:     {term, M4} = get_term(P),
  177: 
  178:     {term, M5} = get_term(P),
  179:     true = (M5 =:= #{a => [], [] => #{2=>d}}),
  180:     {term, M5} = get_term(P),
  181: 
  182:     [{term, {"FAILED ei_x_format",_,_}} = get_term(P)
  183:      || _ <- lists:seq(1,10)],
  184: 
  185:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  186:     ok.
  187: 
  188: 
  189: format_wo_ver(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  190:     P = runner:start(Config, ?format_wo_ver),
  191: 
  192:     {term, [-1, 2, $c, {a, "b"}, {c, 10}, M]} = get_term(P),
  193:     #{d := 32} = M,
  194: 
  195:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  196:     ok.
